      • findAllIncomeTransactionSumsByYearAndMonth

        @Query(value="SELECT new hr.petkovic.incomeexpense.DTO.TimeAggDTO(YEAR(ft.createDate), MONTH(ft.createDate), SUM(amount)) FROM FinancialTransaction ft WHERE  ft.type.name=\'Income\' GROUP BY YEAR(ft.createDate), MONTH(ft.createDate)")
